resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Sign Up
Enter the email address associated with your account.
We will email you the process to reset your password.

font.i: Discover personalized skincare recommendations and expert product suggestions with our app. Get tailored skincare advice and professional image-based product classifications at your fingertips

resources.string: A MOBILE BASED APPLICATION FOR DETECTING COUNTERFEIT FOREIGN EXCHANGE CURRENCIES THROUGH IMAGE PROCESSING
Click the "CAPTURE" button and take a photo of the paper bill. Make sure the image is clear and suits the gridlines of the camera.
Open your internet connection. Select your desired country and enter the amount.
Select or import your desired image from your gallery.

M-Dect: A Mobile Based Application for Detecting Counterfeit Foreign Exchange (forex) Currencies Through Image Processing, which makes it simpler and more accessible for people and businesses to verify the legitimacy of their currency transactions, it has the potential to transform the way that foreign exchange currencies are now validated. Another feature of this would be the currency converter. This application is only limited for US dollar ($), South Korean won (₩), India rupiah (Rp), New Taiwan dollar (NT$), Yen (JP¥) and Philippine peso (₱). Other currencies may not work in this application
